#******** END OF AUTOGENERATED CONTENT ********



add_library( gucefLOADER ${ALL_FILES} )
set_target_properties( gucefLOADER PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS GUCEF_LOADER_BUILD_MODULE )
GUCEF_config_lib( gucefLOADER )
